entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
